welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful LaSalle, Canada! Known for its charming small-town atmosphere and stunning waterfront views, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Windsor Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Detroit City Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving most major airlines.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Run Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and rental car services.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Run Airport is a major hub for shipping and logistics, serving a wide range of domestic and international destinations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Selfridge ANGB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Selfridge ANGB Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
